title: Spumoni Ice Cream Terrine Recipe
full_text:
Spumoni Ice Cream Terrine Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Active
15 mins
Freezing Time
4 hrs 50 mins
Total
5 hrs
Serves
8 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
3
cups
pistachio ice cream
, softened
3
cups
vanilla
(or cherry vanilla)
ice cream
, softened
1
cup
maraschino cherries
, chopped
1/3
cup
sliced almonds
, chopped
2
tablespoons
cherry brandy
1
teaspoon
almond extract
A few specks
pink food coloring
3
cups
chocolate ice cream
, softened
Directions
Line a 9- by 5-inch loaf pan with plastic wrap. Place a 12- by 8-inch piece of parchment paper into pan, letting sides overhang the edges. Spread pistachio ice cream into pan and smooth the top. Freeze until semi-frozen, about 20 minutes.
Stir vanilla ice cream, chopped cherries, almonds, brandy, and almond extract until combined. Stir in food coloring (if using) to desired shade of pink. Spread over pistachio ice cream. Freeze for 30 minutes, or until semi-firm.
Spread chocolate ice cream over cherry ice cream and smooth top. Wrap and freeze until completely solid, 3 to 4 hours. Remove from pan, remove wrap, and slice with a hot, wet, knife.
Special Equipment
9- by 5-inch loaf pan
Ice Cream
Italian-American
Cherry
Pistachios
Summer Desserts
